interestingFact: France is the most visited country in the world, with over 89 million tourists annually.
The Amazon Rainforest, which is mostly located in Brazil, produces 20% of the world's oxygen.
Australia is the only continent that is also a country.
Canada has the longest coastline in the world, stretching over 202,080 kilometers.
South Africa has three capital cities: Pretoria (executive), Cape Town (legislative), and Bloemfontein (judicial).
